## ThemeLoadOptions.logger property

Custom logging channel on which diagnostics and warnings will be reported.

If not specified, \[\[ThemeLoader.load\]\] will log to `console`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
logger?: ISimpleChannel;
```
